Almost sure that is because the function will not be finished until the end of the loop

So for the `FadeIn`:
```
...

...

Before calling the `FadeIn` function it'll be `0.0`, after - `1.0`

Not sure how it works in DayZ, but try to find anything about asynchronous functions
